participant_1.name: John
participant_1.background: I have three daughters. I grew up on a farm in Kansas. My wife and I like to go scuba diving. I love to go horseback riding.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.background: My favorite movie is Goodfellas. My parents have been married for 40 years. I love to read. I am a proofreader for a greeting card company.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, watch movies, and spend time with my family.
What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is Goodfellas. It's such a good movie!
I've never seen it. Is it about gangsters?
Yes, it's about a group of gangsters who rise to power in the New York City underworld. It's a great movie!
I'll have to check it out. What do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and thrillers.
I love historical fiction too! What's your favorite historical fiction book?

My favorite historical fiction book is The Nightingale by Kristin Hannah. It's about two sisters who are separated during World War II and their journey to find each other. It's a beautiful and heartbreaking book.
That sounds like a great book! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's one of my favorite books.
What do you do for work?
I'm a proofreader for a greeting card company.
Oh, that's interesting! What's it like to be a proofreader?
It's a lot of fun! I get to read a lot of different books and articles, and I get to help make sure that they're error-free.
That sounds like a great job! Do you enjoy it?
I love it! It's a perfect fit for me.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
